Directions
Add rum, lime juice, maple syrup, and Scotch to a cocktail shaker and fill 2/3 full with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Double-strain into a coupe glass, garnish with lime wheel, and serve immediately.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer, fine-mesh strainer
